title: Bronze platelegs

properties.name: description
properties.value: Bronze platelegs are leg armour made of bronze, requiring level 1 Defence to wear (as is the same with other bronze and iron items). They share the same defensive stats as a bronze plateskirt but weigh more. They can be made at level 16 Smithing by using a hammer and 3 bronze bars at an anvil.

Item ID1075

Bronze platelegs are leg armour made of bronze, requiring level 1 Defence to wear (as is the same with other bronze and iron items). They share the same defensive stats as a bronze plateskirt but weigh more. They can be made at level 16 Smithing by using a hammer and 3 bronze bars at an anvil.

These can be bought from Louie's Armoured Legs Bazaar in Al Kharid.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-21-11
 Defence bonuses
+8+7+6-4+7

[[File:Bronze platelegs detail.png|left|90px]]
'''Bronze platelegs''' are leg [[armour]] made of [[bronze equipment|bronze]], requiring level 1 [[Defence]] to wear (as is the same with other bronze and [[iron item]]s). They share the same defensive stats as a [[bronze plateskirt]] but weigh more. They can be made at level 16 [[Smithing]] by using a hammer and 3 [[bronze bar]]s at an anvil.

These can be bought from [[Louie's Armoured Legs Bazaar]] in [[Al Kharid]].
